forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High around 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 59F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low near 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. Low 41F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 4C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low around 40F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 56F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
